summary.para: Creates a write-only bundle object to which app packages can be added.

param.name: outputStream
param.para: The output stream that receives the serialized package data. The stream must support at least the method.

param.name: bundleVersion
param.para: The version number of the bundle.

If set to 0, CreateBundleWriter sets the version number of the bundle to a value derived from the current system time. We recommend passing 0 so version numbers are automatically generated and each successive call generates a higher version number.
For example, if you call CreateBundleWriter on 2013/12/23 3:45:00 AM UTC with bundleVersion set to 0, the version number of the bundle becomes 2013.1223.0345.0000.

param.para: The bundle writer created by this method.

summary.para: Creates objects for reading and writing bundle packages.

remarks.para: The IAppxBundleFactory interface provides factory methods to create readers and writers of bundle packages as well as methods to create readers for manifests outside of a bundle.
The IAppxBundleFactory interface is the main entry point to the Appx Bundle APIs.
